concise_definition: n. 杀戮, 杀害; adj. 极好的, 极有效的; v. 杀死 (kill 的现在分词)

definitions.explanation_en: The act of causing the death of a person or animal, often violently or intentionally.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指有意或暴力地导致人或动物死亡的行为。
definitions.example_en: The murder was ruled a killing in the heat of passion.
definitions.example_cn: 这起谋杀被裁定为激情杀人。

definitions.explanation_en: A large amount of money earned quickly or easily, especially in business or gambling contexts.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指在商业或赌博等情境中快速或轻易赚取的大量金钱。
definitions.example_en: The new app became a killing in the tech market.
definitions.example_cn: 这款新应用在科技市场大获成功，赚得盆满钵满。

definitions.explanation_en: Used informally to describe something extremely effective, impressive, or attractive, especially in performance or style.
definitions.explanation_cn: 非正式用语，形容某事物极其有效、令人印象深刻或极具吸引力，尤指表现或风格方面。
definitions.example_en: She wore a killing outfit to the party.
definitions.example_cn: 她穿了一套超棒的服装去参加派对。

definitions.explanation_en: To cause the death of a living being, whether intentionally or accidentally.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指导致生物死亡，无论是有意还是无意。
definitions.example_en: The driver was charged with killing a pedestrian while texting.
definitions.example_cn: 该司机因边发短信边开车撞死行人而被指控。

comparison.analysis: “Murder” (谋杀) 是法律术语，特指有预谋、非法且恶意的杀人行为，具有明确的主观故意和违法性。而 “killing” 是更宽泛的中性词，可包含合法（如正当防卫）或非故意的致死行为。
“Slaughter” (屠杀) 强调大规模、残忍或系统性的杀戮，常用于动物或战争场景，带有强烈的暴力和血腥色彩。而 “killing” 可用于单个或少量对象，语义范围更广，情感色彩较弱。
“Death” (死亡) 是名词，指生命终止的状态或结果，不涉及行为本身。而 “killing” 强调导致死亡的“行为”或“过程”，是造成死亡的原因，具有主动性和施动性。
